comments:
Build ID: I20070517-1700

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create Taipan diagram "First". Create Port "FirstPort" in it.
2. Create one more Taipan diagram "Second". Create shortcut to "FirstPort" in the second diagram.
3. Come back to "First" diagram and "delete from model" FirstPort. ClassCastException in log, Second diagram is frozen.

Repeats in MDT ClassD.



More information:
More information:
I use Eclipse/GEF/EMF/OCL version 3.3 RC3; current GMF Tool/GMF runtime/Taipan sources.

related SRC: #189403, came from newsgroup. 

Looks like diagram update bug.

Created an attachment (id=71724)
TextAware.xpt

There's no reason to use notation element as parser's element if we do know there should exist semantic element.
Note we'll need another PMC member to approve.  Adding Ed.
